The encoded value is appended to the `work` string.
After encoding all the characters, it checks if the length of `work` is divisible by 5. If not, it appends zeros to make it divisible by 5.
Then it iterates over `work` in chunks of 5 characters and calls the `Decode()` method of the `MyConv` class to decode each chunk.
The decoded character is appended to the `out` string.
Finally, it prints the `out` string as the output.
